item.title: 日本 12 月出口增长 2.8%，快于预期
item.description: 周四的数据显示，日本12月份的出口连续第三个月增长，这表明企业在美国新总统唐纳德-特朗普承诺可能征收高额关税之前提前装运了货物。【原文：Japan's exports rose for a third straight month in December, data showed on Thursday, suggesting that companies front-loaded shipments ahead of potentially hefty tariffs promised by new U.S. President Donald Trump.】

item.title: 韩国第四季度经济在政治混乱中勉强增长
item.description: 韩国央行周四的高级预估数据显示，由于国内需求受到该国数十年来最严重的政治危机的影响，韩国经济在2024年第四季度几乎没有增长，低于市场预期。【原文：South Korea's economy barely grew in the fourth quarter of 2024, missing market expectations, as domestic demand was hurt by the country's worst political crisis in decades, advanced central bank estimates showed on Thursday.】

item.title: 分析师称大众品牌 6% 的中期利润率目标切实可行
item.description: 伯恩斯坦研究公司（Bernstein Research）的一份报告称，大众汽车周三向投资者表示，大众乘用车品牌 6% 的利润率目标在 "中期 "更为现实，这家德国汽车制造商此前的目标是到 2026 年达到 6.5% 的利润率。【原文：Volkswagen told investors on Wednesday that its target of a 6% margin on the VW passenger car brand was now more realistic in the "medium term", according to a note by Bernstein Research, after the German carmaker previously aimed to hit a 6.5% margin by 2026.】

item.title: 人工智能蓬勃发展，SK 海力士季度利润超三星，创历史新高
item.description: 韩国 SK 海力士（SK Hynix）周四公布了创纪录的季度利润，原因是这家英伟达（Nvidia）供应商的先进芯片（如用于生成人工智能芯片组的高带宽内存（HBM））销售强劲。【原文：South Korea's SK Hynix on Thursday posted a record quarterly profit as the Nvidia supplier saw strong sales of advanced chips such as high-bandwidth memory (HBM) used in generative artificial intelligence chipsets.】

item.title: 阿拉斯加航空公司第四季度利润超出预期，第一季度旅游需求强劲，亏损减少
item.description: 阿拉斯加航空集团（Alaska Air Group）周三公布的第四季度利润高于华尔街预期，并预计本季度亏损将小于预期，原因是假日和企业旅行需求强劲，以及定价能力提高。【原文：Alaska Air Group on Wednesday topped Wall Street estimates for fourth-quarter profit and forecast a smaller-than-expected loss for the current quarter, driven by strong holiday and corporate travel demand as well as improved pricing power.】

item.title: 贷款损失准备金减少，Discover Financial 第四季度利润大增
item.description: 美国信用卡发行商发现金融公司（Discover Financial）周三公布，受信贷损失准备金下降和利息收入增加的帮助，第四季度利润增长了三倍多。【原文：U.S. credit card issuer Discover Financial posted a more than threefold increase in fourth-quarter profit on Wednesday, helped by a drop in provisions for credit losses and a rise in interest income.】

item.title: 美国联合航空公司首席执行官称国内客座率回落是持久趋势
item.description: 美国联合航空公司（United Airlines）首席执行官斯科特-柯比（Scott Kirby）周三表示，国内市场机票座位的减少正在推动美国航空公司盈利的增长。【原文：A reduction in airline seats in the domestic market that is fueling U.S. airline earnings is here to stay, United Airlines CEO Scott Kirby said on Wednesday.】

item.title: 澳大利亚 Insignia Financial 公司收到贝恩资本 19.2 亿美元的甜美出价
item.description: Insignia Financial周四表示，它已收到美国贝恩资本（Bain Capital）提出的更高报价，拟以30.7亿澳元（约合19.2亿美元）收购这家资金管理公司，与竞争对手CC Capital Partners的报价相当，竞购战正在升级。【原文：Insignia Financial said on Thursday it has received an improved offer from U.S.-based Bain Capital to acquire the money manager for A$3.07 billion ($1.92 billion), matching rival CC Capital Partners' offer as bidding war escalates.】

item.title: 早间竞价："眩晕 "的华尔街创下新高，日本央行迫在眉睫
item.description: 亚洲市场前瞻【原文：A look at the day ahead in Asian markets.】

item.title: 据 CNBC 报道，CNN 和 NBC 新闻将裁员
item.description: 据 CNBC 周三援引知情人士的话报道，华纳兄弟探索频道（Warner Bros Discovery）旗下的 CNN 计划于周四裁员数百人，以重新聚焦全球数字受众。【原文：CNN, a unit of Warner Bros Discovery , plans to lay off hundreds of employees on Thursday, as it refocuses the business around a global digital audience, CNBC reported on Wednesday, citing people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 独家消息：消息人士称，激进分子 Ananym 计划对 Henry Schein 发起代理权争夺战
item.description: 三位熟悉此事的消息人士称，激进投资者 Ananym Capital Management 计划向 Henry Schein 董事会提名多达六位董事，认为这家牙科和医疗分销商需要开始寻找新的首席执行官、削减成本并优化资本配置。【原文：Activist investor Ananym Capital Management plans to nominate as many as half a dozen directors to the board at Henry Schein , arguing the dental and medical distributor needs to start searching for a new CEO, cut costs and optimize capital allocation, three sources familiar with the matter said.】

item.title: EA 下调 2025 年预订量预期，股价下跌
item.description: 视频游戏公司电子艺界（Electronic Arts）周三下调了对 2025 财年预订额的预期，理由是一些体育游戏的业绩疲软。【原文：Video gaming company Electronic Arts cut its forecast for fiscal year 2025 bookings on Wednesday, citing weakness across some sports titles.】

item.title: 美国延长拜登时代液化天然气研究报告的评论截止日期以保护审批权
item.description: 在顾问们敦促唐纳德-特朗普总统采取耐心的态度以防止批准被法院推翻之后，美国延长了一项关于蓬勃发展的液化天然气（LNG）出口业务对经济和环境影响的联邦研究的征求意见期。【原文：The U.S. has extended the comment period on a federal study of the economic and environmental impacts of the booming liquefied natural gas (LNG) export business after advisers had urged President Donald Trumpto take a patient approach to prevent approvals from getting overturned in court.】

item.title: 管道运营商金德摩根第四季度利润不及预期
item.description: 周三，康德摩根公司（Kinder Morgan）的季度利润略低于华尔街预期，此前这家美国输油管道和码头运营商因其输油管道运输的原油和凝析油减少而受到影响。【原文：Kinder Morgan narrowly missed Wall Street's expectations for quarterly profit on Wednesday after the U.S. pipeline and terminal operator was hurt by lower crude and condensate transported through its pipelines.】

item.title: 白宫称暂停爱尔兰共和军拨款的命令仅适用于部分项目
item.description: 白宫表示，唐纳德-特朗普总统本周下令暂停支付根据其前任签署的气候和基础设施法律拨付的资金，这一命令主要适用于阻止化石燃料发展或促进电动汽车发展的项目。【原文：The White House said President Donald Trump’s order this week pausing the disbursement of funds appropriated under his predecessor’s signature climate and infrastructure laws mainly applies to programs that discourage fossil fuel development or boost electric vehicles.】

item.title: 美国 Meta 用户报告自动重新关注总统和副总统账户
item.description: 一些 Meta 社交媒体用户周三表示，他们的账户重新关注了唐纳德-特朗普总统、副总统詹德-万斯和第一夫人梅拉尼娅-特朗普的个人资料，而在特朗普就任第二任期后，他们取消了对这些账户的关注。【原文：Some Meta social media users said on Wednesday that their accounts re-followed the profiles of President Donald Trump, Vice President JD Vance and first lady Melania Trump after they had unfollowed those accounts once Trump took office for his second term.】

item.title: 特朗普削减 DEI 迫使达沃斯精英为多样性寻找新词汇
item.description: 唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）总统对私营部门施加的放弃多元化计划的压力不断升级，这让达沃斯的一些人开始寻找新的词汇来描述他们认为对企业至关重要的工作场所实践。【原文：President Donald Trump's escalating pressure on the private sector to ditch diversity programs has left some in Davos searching for new words to describe workplace practices they say are essential to their businesses.】

item.title: 投资者在 Venture Global 首次公开募股降价前对其盈利前景表示担忧
item.description: 投资者告诉路透社，Venture Global LNG 被迫将其在美国首次公开募股（IPO）中寻求的估值降低近一半，因为投资者对该公司液化天然气用于出口的长期利润估算持反对意见。【原文：Venture Global LNG was forced to nearly halve the valuation it is seeking in its U.S. initial public offering (IPO) after investors balked at the company's estimated long-term profit for liquefying gas for export, investors told Reuters.】

item.title: 三星发布配备高通芯片和增强型人工智能功能的 Galaxy S25 手机
item.description: 三星电子（Samsung Electronics）周三发布了搭载高通（Qualcomm）芯片和谷歌人工智能模型的最新旗舰智能手机，希望其升级后的人工智能功能能重振销量，抵御苹果和中国竞争对手的冲击。【原文：Samsung Electronics on Wednesday unveiled its newest flagship smartphone, powered by Qualcomm's chips and Google's artificial-intelligence model, hoping its upgraded AI features can reinvigorate sales and fend off Apple and Chinese rivals.】

item.title: 安永调查显示，特朗普执政后，首席执行官们对交易前景更加乐观
item.description: 一项调查显示，在美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）于11月当选连任后，越来越多的全球首席执行官预计将在2025年进行更多的企业交易。【原文：Global chief executives see much more corporate dealmaking in 2025, with an increased number expecting to pursue mergers and acquisitions after U.S. President Donald Trump was elected to a second term in November, a survey showed.】

item.title: 德国商业银行称裕信银行的做法是敌对的、单方面的
item.description: 德国商业银行周三将意大利联合信贷银行（UniCredit）的潜在合作方式定义为 "敌意"，并称在过去两年中没有与这家意大利银行进行过任何讨论，尽管意大利联合信贷银行首席执行官 Andrea Orcel 曾表示有过讨论。【原文：Commerzbank on Wednesday defined UniCredit's approach for a potential tie-up as "hostile", and said there had been no discussion of it with the Italian bank in the past two years, despite UniCredit CEO Andrea Orcel saying there had.】

item.title: 特朗普推动用关税支付减税在国会面临反对意见
item.description: 美国总统唐纳德-特朗普正在推动一项计划，明确利用提高进口商品关税的收入来帮助支付延长数万亿美元减税政策的费用，这一史无前例的转变可能会遭到国会中许多共和党同僚的反对。【原文：U.S. President Donald Trump is pushing a plan to explicitly use revenue from higher tariffs on imported goods to help pay for extending trillions of dollars in tax cuts, an unprecedented shift likely to face opposition from many of his fellow Republicans in Congress.】

item.title: 消息人士称，Permira、Blackstone 正在考虑数十亿欧元的 Mobile.de IPO
item.description: 三位知情人士称，收购集团 Permira 和 Blackstone 正在权衡对德国在线汽车市场 Mobile.de 进行数十亿欧元的首次公开募股。【原文：Buyout groups Permira and Blackstone are weighing a multi-billion-euro initial public offering of German online auto marketplace Mobile.de, three people with knowledge of the situation said.】

item.title: 汰渍洗涤剂制造商宝洁公司着眼于新一轮涨价以抵消即将到来的关税
item.description: 美国消费品制造商宝洁公司一位高管周三表示，如果唐纳德-特朗普总统征收新的关税，增加进口成本，该公司将再次寻求提高汰渍洗涤剂等家用基本产品的价格。【原文：U.S. consumer goods maker Procter & Gamble will again look to hike prices on its household basics such as Tide detergent if President Donald Trump imposes new tariffs that increase the cost of imports, an executive said Wednesday.】

item.title: 2024 年 SLB 在俄罗斯的资产价值为 6 亿美元，与 2023 年持平
item.description: 美国顶级油田服务公司 SLB 表示，截至 2024 年底，其在俄罗斯的净资产约为 6 亿美元，与 2023 年持平，但该地区的收入有所下滑。【原文：Top U.S. oilfield services company SLB said its net assets in Russia amounted to about $600 million at the end of 2024, unchanged from 2023, but revenue from the region had slipped.】

item.title: 纽约州获得针对被控掠夺性贷款人的 10.65 亿美元判决
item.description: 纽约州总检察长莱蒂西亚-詹姆斯（Letitia James）周三表示，她的办公室获得了对黄石资本公司（Yellowstone Capital）10.65 亿美元的判决，该公司是一家被控掠夺性贷款的现金垫款提供商，作为和解协议的一部分，该公司为小企业提供了超过 5 亿美元的债务减免。【原文：New York Attorney General Letitia James said on Wednesday her office obtained a $1.065 billion judgment against Yellowstone Capital, a cash advance provider accused of predatory lending, as part of a settlement that gives small businesses more than a half-billion dollars of debt relief.】

item.title: 消息称利安德将于本周末开始关闭休斯顿炼油厂
item.description: 利安德巴塞尔工业公司（LyondellBasell Industries）熟悉工厂运营的人士表示，该公司将于本周末开始永久性关闭其在休斯顿的日产量为 263,776 桶的炼油厂。【原文：LyondellBasell Industries will begin the permanent closure of its 263,776 barrel-per-day Houston refinery this coming weekend, said people familiar with plant operations.】

item.title: 美国上周原油库存可能下降，产品库存增加
item.description: 路透社周三进行的一项调查显示，上周美国原油库存预计将下降，而汽油和馏分油库存则可能上升。【原文：U.S. crude oil stockpiles were expected to have fallen last week while gasoline and distillate inventories likely rose, an extended Reuters poll showed on Wednesday.】

item.title: 特朗普退出气候法案与大石油公司产生罕见分歧
item.description: 美国石油和天然气生产商对唐纳德-特朗普总统希望鼓励国内能源发展感到兴奋，但他们表示，特朗普退出国际气候合作的决定无助于他们在全球向清洁能源转型过程中的投资计划。【原文：U.S. oil and gas producers are thrilled that President Donald Trump wants to encourage domestic energy development but say his decision to withdraw the United States from international climate cooperation will not help their investment plans in the global transition to cleaner energy.】

item.title: 2024 年净利润低于预期，彪马宣布削减成本
item.description: 体育用品品牌彪马周三宣布了一项成本削减计划，此前该公司公布的 2024 年净利润低于上年同期水平，未达预期。【原文：Sportswear brand Puma announced a cost-cutting programme on Wednesday after reporting 2024 net profit below the prior year's level, missing its expectations.】
